name: Turn Control
description: Roll Phase: If Yelan, who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Die will be rolled as Omni Element for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)
descriptionraw: Roll Phase: If $[A1209], who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Die will be rolled as $[K411] for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)
descriptionreplaced: Roll Phase: If Yelan, who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Die will be rolled as <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)
